name: Liight
overview: The wait is over! Liight is a unique, award winning puzzle solving game from independent developer Studio Walljump where you use colored lights and shadows to solve puzzles and make music. Each puzzle in Liight is a unique combination of colored lights and targets arranged on a special board. If you completely cover a target with light of the matching color, the target will glow and play music. A puzzle is solved when all the targets are glowing and playing music together. Every puzzle makes a different song each time you play! Nonstop mode in Liight is a fast paced arcade puzzle game that uses the same basic concepts you learn in Solve mode in constant struggle for a high score. With a lot of skill and a little luck, you can keep the game going forever! Liight also has a Create mode to make your own puzzles any way you want, and a Share mode to send them to your Wii Friends using WiiConnect24! Don't miss out on this creative and unique game, exclusively on Nintendo WiiWare! Features • Unique, Award-Winning game play with Light and Shadow! • Solve 100 puzzles and make new music every time. • Create your own puzzles and Share with WiiConnect24. • Nonstop arcade mode offers an advanced challenge.
